import React from 'react' import './About.css'; export default function About() { return (

Welcome to Gen AI Editor

Redefining Creativity with the Power of Generative AI

Gen AI Editor is a powerful and intelligent editing platform where creativity meets cutting-edge AI. Designed for creators, editors, and tech enthusiasts, our app enables:

  • 🎥 Video Background Removal – Effortlessly isolate subjects from complex scenes
  • 🧽 Object Removal – Erase unwanted elements in photos & videos with precision
  • ✨ Smart Enhancements – Auto color correction, filters, and beautification
  • ⚡ Fast Processing – Optimized GPU-accelerated workflows
  • 📂 Seamless Upload & Export – User-friendly and lightning fast

🚀 Built With

Gen AI Editor is crafted with modern, scalable technologies:

  • ⚛️ React.js for interactive UI
  • 🔥 FastAPI as backend
  • 🧠 AI Models (RVM, ZITS, Mask2Former)
  • 🎞️ OpenCV & MoviePy for media processing
  • 🌍 Hugging Face for GPU deployment

💡 Our Vision

To empower creators by removing the barriers of traditional editing. With AI by your side, every idea becomes achievable — quickly, beautifully, and intelligently.

Gen AI — where imagination becomes creation. ✨

); }
